item.title: Dem Caucus Still Reeling from Schumer’s Shutdown Switcheroo, Divided on Strategy
item.description: ‘There are a lot of free riders in my caucus,’ Senator Fetterman said.

item.title: Banning ‘Ninja Swords’ Will Bring Britain Only Bitter Failure
item.description: Starmer’s seeming ridiculous announcement will do nothing but slap a symbolic bandage on a far deeper generational psychological wound.

item.title: You Can’t Win a War on Prices
item.description: We should have learned that lesson from Richard Nixon’s wage and price controls.

item.title: Trump-Targeted Law Firm Paul Weiss Was Already Bending the Knee, in Another Direction
item.description: We should never have reached the point where presidents can threaten law firms over whom they hire and represent.

item.title: A 21st Century HHS Should Serve People, Not Bureaucracy
item.description: Secretary Kennedy’s announcement of a shake-up at the Department of Health and Human Services spotlights the need for major reform at the bloated agen...
